DataListSpec.Name: Top Food Item Shortages By BPRun Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Top Food Item Shortages By Business Process Run
DataListSpec.Author: Technical Training

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_TopFoodItemShortByBPRun ( @BUSINESSPROCESSOUTPUTID UniqueIdentifier = NULL , @SUMCURRENTINVERTORYSOLDOUT Bit = Null )
as set nocount on;
DECLARE @OUTPUTTABLENAME NVARCHAR(100) DECLARE @SQLQUERY AS NVARCHAR(500) DECLARE @SQLHAVINGCLAUSE as NVARCHAR(100)
SET @SQLHAVINGCLAUSE = '' IF @SUMCURRENTINVERTORYSOLDOUT = 1 BEGIN SET @SQLHAVINGCLAUSE = ' HAVING SUM(CURRENTINVENTORY) = 0 ' END
SELECT @OUTPUTTABLENAME = TABLENAME FROM dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSOUTPUT WHERE dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSOUTPUT.ID = @BUSINESSPROCESSOUTPUTID
SET @SQLQUERY = 'SELECT TOP 5 FOODITEMNAME , SUM(INVENTORYSHORTAGE) as SUMINVENTORYSHORTAGE , SUM(CURRENTINVENTORY) as SUMCURRENTINVENTORY FROM ' + @OUTPUTTABLENAME + ' GROUP BY FOODITEMNAME ' + @SQLHAVINGCLAUSE + ' ORDER BY SUMINVENTORYSHORTAGE DESC'
EXECUTE (@SQLQuery)
